summary: This is an internal email from Nicholas Biase, a Public Affairs officer at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, to U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman and others. It forwards a Fox News article link about the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death and includes Biase's brief comment 'Not helpful.'

keyFacts: An internal DOJ email from November 2019 shows staff discussing media coverage of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Public Affairs officer Nicholas Biase characterized a Fox News article on the investigation as 'Not helpful.'
The email was sent to U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman, indicating high-level awareness within the SDNY office regarding the Epstein case.
The subject of the email references the investigation exploring the 'possibility of criminal enterprise' in Epstein's death.
